Talk_0001:
The Stone Slab at the Nestled Ring Ruin:
Some Translation Notes
　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　 　-Tauro<sp:0:4:0>"Those who...most elite among the...
granted...qualifications...are chosen
as sages...<sp:0:4:0>"Those...worthy...secret stones...and
henceforth...sages."<sp:0:4:0>Clearly, the sages are the subject of
this slab.<sp:0:4:0>Filling in the blanks, I think it's basically
saying, "Talented individuals become
sages by taking up secret stones."
